alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 6:44AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Nassau and northeastern Duval Counties through 715 AM EDT... At 644 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a waterspout near Talbot Island, or 11 miles south of Fernandina Beach, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Waterspouts and winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Waterspouts can easily overturn boats and create locally hazardous waters. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Little Talbot Island, Mayport and Talbot Island. WATERSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
